feed.title: Infisical Releases

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.41.8
entry.content:
Changelog

  • ed4882dfa fix: simplify gateway http copy logic
  • caa129b56 requested changes
  • 07902f7db feat(identities/kubernetes-auth): use gateway as token reviewer
  • 6ae7b5e99 cleanup
  • 400157a46 feat(cli): gateway auth methods

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.132.3-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • misc: update dynamic secret validation error handling by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3712
  • feat: resolved cert issue with localhost by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3717
  • Fix/UI button fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3719
  • Improvement(secret-sharing): Allow free number entry for max views in secret sharing by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3716
  • improvement(email-templates): Add y-padding to email body by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3720
  • feat(dynamic-secret): add vertica dynamic secret option by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3710
  • feature(secret-scanning-v2): secret scanning architecture and github data source by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3677
  • Fix broken UI for secret requests due to long secret values by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3724
  • doc: add oidc auth doc for spire by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3725
  • improvement(org-users-table): Add filter by roles to org users table by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3718
  • feat: updated ui for replication approval by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3729
  • Improvement: add more aggresive rate limiting on smtp endpoints by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3726
  • improvement(smtp-rate-limit): trim and substring keys and default to realIp by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3733
  • improvement(permissions): Prevent comma separated values with eq and neq checks by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3728
  • feat: added lock for project create by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3737
  • Add {{environment}} support for key schemas by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3732
  • improvement(org-access-control): Add org access control no access display by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3730
  • feat(identities/kubernetes-auth): gateway as token reviewer by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3731
  • Fix for inviteUserToOrganization for usernames with no email formats by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3741
  • fix(gateway): handle malformed URL's by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3742
  • feat: added invalidate function to lock by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3739
  • feat: updated dynamic secret,secret import to support glob in environment by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3748

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.132.2-postgres...infisical/v0.132.3-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.132.4-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(oidc): add azure docs for OIDC authentication by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3715
  • fix(gateway): allow multiple requests when using http proxy by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3751
  • fix invite bug by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3721
  • feat: assume role mode for aws dynamic secret iam by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3750
  • feat: added k8s metadata in template policy by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3752
  • feature(gcp-sync): Add support for syncing to locations by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3738
  • Add identityName to Dynamic Secrets userName template by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3722
  • feature(group-projects): Add project group details page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.132.3-postgres...infisical/v0.132.4-postgres
